intro.subtitle: ABOUT US
intro.text1: APS Consulting is your reliable partner in various administrative services including immigration, non-profit organization establishment, and corporate certification.
intro.text2: We apply systematic processes to all tasks, managing progress transparently and meticulously from start to finish.
intro.text3: Whatever your goals, we will create trustworthy results through our sincerity and expertise.

services.subtitle: OUR SERVICES
services.title: Main Service Areas
services.desc: We provide the best services based on expertise and experience

service1.title: Immigration & VISA Services
service1.subtitle: Immigration & Visa Services
service1.desc: Status of residence changes/extensions, professional/unskilled visas, family invitation/accompanying family visas, permanent residence/naturalization applications, etc.

service2.title: Non-Profit Organization Setup
service2.subtitle: Non-Profit Organization Setup
service2.desc: Non-profit corporation establishment approval, articles of association amendment, operation reporting, executive changes, various filing agency services, etc.

service3.title: Business Certification & Permits
service3.subtitle: Business Certification & Permits
service3.desc: Corporate certifications, business licenses/registrations, factory registrations, development permits, land-related permits, etc.

service4.title: Civil Affairs & Admin Support
service4.subtitle: Civil Affairs & Administrative Support
service4.desc: Complaint/petition writing, administrative appeals, fine/disposition explanations, contract writing, etc.

why.subtitle: WHY CHOOSE US
why.title: Why Choose APS Consulting
why.desc: Ensuring visa approval through differentiated expertise and service

why1.title: Multiple Expert Administrative Scriveners
why1.desc: As a corporation, we have expert administrative scriveners in each field who handle complex administrative tasks systematically and professionally.

why2.title: Collaborative Expert Network
why2.desc: We provide integrated and high-quality services by establishing close cooperation with related experts such as lawyers, accountants, and tax accountants.

why3.title: Continuous Follow-up Consulting
why3.desc: We support stable administrative work by providing continuous follow-up management and consulting as a long-term partner, not just one-time service.

why4.title: Transparent Progress Sharing
why4.desc: We share all progress in real-time, building trust and relieving client anxiety through clear cost guidance and schedule management.

cta.title: Consult with an Expert
cta.desc:

Apply for a consultation now.

form.subtitle: ONLINE CONSULTATION
form.title: Quick Online Inquiry
form.intro:
If you need consultation regarding administrative work, please feel free to contact us anytime.
We will review your submission and contact you promptly.
form.name: Name *
form.nationalityNote: The country list is automatically loaded. If you select Other, please enter directly in the memo.
form.companyPlaceholder: Enter your affiliation or company name
form.attachmentsNote: Maximum 5 files, 20MB or less per file (images/documents)
form.messagePlaceholder: Please write your consultation details in detail
form.agreeAllBtn: I agree to all required items above
form.agreeTerms: [Required] I agree to the Basic Service Terms
form.agreePrivacy: [Required] I agree to the collection and use of required personal information
form.agreeTransfer: [Required] I agree to the international transfer of personal information

success.title: Consultation request has been submitted
